property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 3 or more cards in your mana zone, you may pay Fire 1: to summon this creature. If you do, destroy this creature at the end of the turn, then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ 'Civil Count 2': If you have a total of 2 or more light creatures and/or light tamaseeds, draw a card. ■ Put a creature that costs 3 or less or a tamaseed that costs 3 or less from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this tamaseed or whenever you cast a spell or use another tamaseed for the first time each turn, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {GUARDMAN} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature from your other creatures to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap it. ■ Whenever your opponent's creatures attack, they must attack this creature if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, search your deck and put a card from it into your graveyard. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put a non-evolution Light dragon creature that costs 7 or less from your hand. That creature gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Your opponent's cards are put into their mana zone tapped.
